r.s: ODBC v3 Interface driver for PDO
r.d: This extension provides an ODBC v3 driver for PDO. It supports unixODBC and IBM DB2 libraries, and will support more in future releases.
r.n:
- Fixed bug #35552 (crash when pdo_odbc prepare fails). (Wez). - Fixed bug #36632 (bad error reporting for pdo_odbc exec UPDATE). (Wez). - repackage with package2.xml
You require either IBM DB2 CLI libraries or unixODBC to use this package.
If you are running on windows, you can download the binary from here: http://pecl4win.php.net/ext.php/php_pdo_odbc.dll
